body: Hi Mostapha, I'd love if you could take a look at two of my files - I have one (#17) that is pulling in my json files from dropbox plus images from both dropbox and an FTP site. But the img and threeD files are being imported as parameters still. I didn't replace all the image/json file addresses with my own files.  Then I have a second file (#19) where I replaced more of the line items with my own data but now the 3D images won't load. I have mostly dropbox links (per #17) but also one ftp link. I see this instead:  [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/oZ37sHtG0B*V2CZvRypSKxAb2cDxm6-c3kZeE8G2BXbZidTWywscYwgAqdlDLMqSVJL1WoQ9S7KIrZ34wDor2R4aRAvxOnpQ/DE_json.PNG) When I loaded my json file from dropbox or the ftp site into a plain webpage, it looked very similar to the dropbox json links from the DE example file. So I don't think it's the file itself.
